attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the government to stop wasting are tax money.As you well know the economy is in financial turmoil.We the british people would like are taxes to be spent wisely and not squander it away.We the british people are getting fed up of working so you the government can waste it.Spend it wisely as the majority of the british people now have to.Due to the higher cost of living.It makes me very upset when i hear that are taxes are spent unlawfully.British people should have more of a say what are hard earned money should be spent on.power to the people i say....

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action not a name, and please ask for a specific action or change.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
